.. _developer_guide:

***************
Developer Guide
***************



Installation
#############

ROS Installation
*****************

1. Follow the ROS Noetic installation guide found at `ROS Installation Guide <http://wiki.ros.org/ROS/Installation>`_

Unreal Engine Installation
***************************

SDK Installation
*****************

2. Install the SDK

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install DTSDK

3. Import the SDK

.. code-block:: python

    from DTSDK import DTSDK

4. hello test test test
